Question.Subject: Is Chatango.com Down?
Question.Content: I've been trying to get on chatango, I've heard that they've moved, or maybe they're down for maintenance, can anybody get on it at all?
Question.ChosenAnswer: I cant get on either, its really frustrating. I hope its only down for maintenance, I've also heard that chatango was shutting down. This really upset me and I heard there was a different site to replace it but I don't remember what the name is. Sorry. As a fellow chatangoer I hope it is up again soon. See you there ^.^

Answer.Content: I've heard that they're moving, too. I think it was Chattanga.com. I'm not sure if they have moved now or will some other time. Though, I'm kinda anxious about it all, now.

I cant get on either, its really frustrating. I hope its only down for maintenance, I've also heard that chatango was shutting down. This really upset me and I heard there was a different site to replace it but I don't remember what the name is. Sorry. As a fellow chatangoer I hope it is up again soon. See you there ^.^
